sent.orig: Whole-cell patch-clamp experiments were performed on acutely dissociated rat dorsal root ganglion (DRG) neurons.
sent.trans: 实验以急性分离的大鼠背根神经节(DRG)神经元为标本，用全细胞膜片钳(whole—cellpatch－clamp)方法记录钙通道电流，观察分析特异性。

sent.orig: A whole consists of parts, the parts constitute the whole.
sent.trans: 整体由部分组成，部分构成整体。

sent.orig: Cast your whole vote, not a strip of paper merely, but your whole influence.
sent.trans: 投下你的一票，那不仅仅是一张纸条，而是你的全部影响。

sent.orig: It is, therefore the attempt to replace opinions about the whole by knowledge the whole.
sent.trans: 因此，哲学是一种以总体之知取代关于总体的意见的努力。

sent.orig: Man is obviously made to think. It is his whole dignity and his whole merit.
sent.trans: 人显然是注定要思考的。那是他的全部尊严和全部优势。
